content_sections.title: Bodhi Tree - Tree of Enlightenment
content: The sacred fig tree (Ficus religiosa) under which Siddhartha Gautama attained enlightenment and became the Buddha. The original tree in Bodh Gaya is one of Buddhism's most sacred sites.
